languages.text: "Ты проиграл. Твоя борьба "за свободу корабля" окончена. Последние слова перед смертью?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
languages.original_text: "Ты проиграл. Твоя борьба "за свободу корабля" окончена. Последние слова перед смертью?"

traits.locale_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"Are you willing to die to destroy me and bring 'freedom' to the vessel?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"Are you willing to die to destroy me and bring 'freedom' to this vessel?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"
"You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt verloren. Euer Kampf um die 'Freiheit' des Schiffs ist vorbei. Irgendwelche letzten Worte, bevor Ihr sterbt?"
languages.original_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt verloren. Euer Kampf um die 'Freiheit' des Schiffs ist vorbei. Irgendwelche letzten Worte, bevor Ihr sterbt?"
"Seid Ihr bereit, zu sterben, um mich zu vernichten und diesem Schiff Eure 'Freiheit' zu bringen?"

languages.text: «Has perdido. Tu batalla por la "libertad" de la nave ha terminado. ¿Unas últimas palabras antes de morir?».
languages.original_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

traits.locale_text: «Has perdido. Tu batalla por la "libertad" de la nave ha terminado. ¿Unas últimas palabras antes de morir?».
«¿Estás dispuesto a morir para destruirme y llevar tu "libertad" a esta nave?».

languages.text: 「お前の負けだ。船の『自由』をかけたお前の戦いは終わりだ。最期に言い残すことはあるか？」
languages.original_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の負けだ。船の『自由』をかけたお前の戦いは終わりだ。最期に言い残すことはあるか？」
「自らしを選んで{mf|俺|私}を討ち、この船に'自由'をもたらすというのか？」

languages.text: “你输了，你所谓的为‘自由’而战到此为止了。临死之前，你有什么遗言要说？”
languages.original_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

traits.locale_text: “你输了，你所谓的为‘自由’而战到此为止了。临死之前，你有什么遗言要说？”
“你是打算拼死一搏，杀了我，让这艘船得到所谓的‘自由’吗？”

languages.text: « Vous avez échoué. Votre combat pour la délivrance du vaisseau touche à son terme. Avez-vous un dernier mot à dire avant de mourir ? »
languages.original_text: "You lost. Your battle for the ship's 'freedom' is at an end. Do you have any last words before you die?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez échoué. Votre combat pour la délivrance du vaisseau touche à son terme. Avez-vous un dernier mot à dire avant de mourir ? »
« Êtes-vous vraiment prêt à mourir pour me détruire et apporter votre ‘liberté' à ce vaisseau ? »
